description: Spring rolls with a light and refreshing centre.
name: Mango & Avocado Spring Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 sheets spring roll pastry sheets, thawed if frozen
2 medium avocado, peeled, de-cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Mix ingredients together in a bowl and place a large spoonful into the centre of a sheet of pastry, fold over the edges and roll tightly.
Brush a baking tray with some sesame oil, place the 8 spring rolls on the baking tray and brush the top with oil.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until starting to crisp, turning halfway and brushing the other side with oil when you turn.
Remove from the oven and serve with a choice of dips/condiments.
